SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Actionable
The Actionable interface represents an action that can be performed on a player during the game.
AdventureToken
Represents an abstract base class for adventure tokens.
ExpeditionDeck
Represents the deck of expedition tokens, including treasure, trap, and relic tokens.
Game
Represents the main game logic for Incan Gold.
GameMessages
Provides various messages for the game to enhance the user experience.
Main
The main class Demonstrates basic functionality such as variable setting, retrieval, and a simple loop.
MainTest
Test class for the Main class.
Players
Represents a player in the game.
RelicToken
Represents a relic token in the game.
SimulationExperiment
The main class to simulate the Incan Gold game.
SimulationResult
Tracks and summarizes the results of the simulation experiment, including win counts, average loot collected, and players with no wins.
Strategy
Represents a decision-making strategy for a player in the game.
StrategyTest
Test class for testing different player strategies in the game.
TokenDecision
Represents a decision token in the game.
TrapToken
Represents various trap tokens in the game.
TreasureToken
Represents a treasure token in the game.
TreasureType
Represents a type of treasure in the game.
